author: Special Correspondent
text:
Sandeep Nanduri, a 2009-batch IAS officer took charge as the new Commissioner of Madurai Corporation, here on Monday.

Basic amenities

In a brief chat with reporters, he said that he would be accessible to the public and ensure basic amenities were in place.

Prior to the new posting, Mr. Sandeep Nanduri had served as Executive Director, Chennai Metro Supply and Sewerage Board, as project officer of District Rural Development Agency, Salem and as Sub-Collector (Land Revenue and Disaster Management), Hosur.

Holding an engineering degree and masters in business administration from IIM-Bangalore, the young IAS officer said he would also strive hard to list Madurai Corporation in the Smart city initiative project in the coming months.
title: Sandeep Nanduri is Madurai’s new Corporation Commissioner
